welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wealdstone, a charming town known for its rich history and beautiful scenery. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this delightful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Terminal 1 is the oldest and smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport. It primarily serves domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is the newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, having opened in 2014. It primarily serves Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Terminal 3 is the second oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport. It primarily serves long-haul flights to North America, South America, and Asia.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Terminal 4 is the third oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport. It primarily serves flights to and from Africa, the Middle East, and Asia.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Terminal 5 is the largest terminal at Heathrow Airport. It primarily serves British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Users must register with their email address to access the network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Luton Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi access is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.
